AddGearWeapon_AdvancedTube_Green.Name: SI Advanced receiver extension buffer tube (anodized green)
AddGearWeapon_AdvancedTube_Green.Description: Strike Industries Advanced receiver extension Buffer Tube, Mil-Spec diameter will fit any AR-15-based carbine or rifle.

AddGearWeapon_AdvancedTube_Blue.Name: SI Advanced receiver extension buffer tube (anodized blue)
AddGearWeapon_AdvancedTube_Blue.Description: Strike Industries Advanced receiver extension Buffer Tube, Mil-Spec diameter will fit any AR-15-based carbine or rifle.

AddGearWeapon_OKP7A.Name: OKP-7A reflex sight
AddGearWeapon_OKP7A.Description: The original design of OKP sights allows firing from unstable positions in rapidly changing conditions, reduces the operator fatigue, and, if necessary, allows unhindered use of base mechanical sights. The key feature of this sight is a rimless reflector attachment that doesn't block any field of fire sections; instead, reflector is protected by thin and durable visor that is almost un-noticeable when firing.

AddGearWeapon_Archangel_OPFOR_Black.Description: Archangel OPFOR PRS for Mosin sniper rifle.

AddGearWeapon_Grip_M1911A1_Black.Name: Black polymer pistol grip for M1911A1
AddGearWeapon_Grip_M1911A1_Black.Description: Standard-issue polymer pistol grip for M1911A1, product by Colt.

AddGearWeapon_LS321_Black.Name: Holosun LS321 Tactical device (Black)
AddGearWeapon_LS321_Black.Description: Holosun LS321 is a multi-laser tactical device with green laser in the visible light spectrum, IR laser and IR searchlight.

AddGearWeapon_FAL_MMW_20RND_Black.Description: 20 rnd, double stack plastic magazine for a FAL/SA-58 7.62x51 NATO rounds.

AddGearWeapon_MDR_762_FDE.Name: DT MDR 7.62x51 Assault Rifle (FDE)
AddGearWeapon_MDR_762_FDE.Description: The product of the US-based company Desert Tech LLC MDR rifle is a modular, multi-caliber weapon with compact bullpup layout. Barrel lengths and calibers can be changed by the end user within minutes with a minimum amount of tools.
